item.description:
We've decided to skip work today and all go play. At last nights fly out, we all loved this idea!

How's Block Island sound for breakfast, rent some scooters and drive around the island for a few hours. Bike week has nothing over us!

Have lunch, enjoy the island, then fly back home. This could be a day trip. I expect a return about 2:00 - 3:00. Or we can change it any way we want. But, it sure sounds like a better day than working and here's your chance to enjoy this summer.

Will we want to stop at ACK for dinner? Or MVY, CQX? Any takers?

These weekday trips have been great and this is our first daytime one. Take Friday off and come along.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: A Summer Friday day off at Block Island
